news_header: A ceasefire between Israel and Hezbollah is in effect until the end of November, but Israel continues its attacks on Lebanon.
news_original_title: Israel tehnyt iskuja kahteen sotilaskohteeseen Libanonissa
news_text: There is a ceasefire between Israel and Hezbollah until the end of November, following over a year of conflict. Despite the ceasefire, Israel has continued its attacks on Lebanon, with accusations of violations from both sides. The last Israeli troops are expected to withdraw from Lebanon on 18 February.
